ValidationRule.description: [US-0006335] Coupon - Validation Rules not to allow coinvest and company details empty for contract send out US-0008488-update on 06/10/2020
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Coupon_Seller_Stage__c), ISPICKVAL(Coupon_Seller_Stage__c, 'Contract Send'), OR( ISBLANK(Legal_Entity_Name_w__c), ISBLANK(Legal_Entity_Street_w__c), ISBLANK(Legal_Entity_Zip_w__c) ), Contract_Language__c <> 'AU', NOT( $Setup.ActiveValidationRules__c.All_Validation_Rules_Deactivated__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Legal Entity Name, Legal Entity Street and Legal Entity ZIP cannot be empty. Please fill out missing fields and then send the contract.
